entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Salluit
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:03 PM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -30.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Salluit Airport 10:00 PM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023
Temperature: -30.4°C
Pressure: 99.9 kPa
Humidity: 67 %

Dewpoint: -34.5°C
Wind: SW 35 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 34. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending this evening then partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Blowing snow. Wind south 40 km/h gusting to 70. Low minus 34. Wind chill minus 46 this evening and minus 52 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 33. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Blowing snow. Wind south 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature steady near minus 33. Wind chill near minus 53. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 37.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Local blowing snow. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 37. Wind chill minus 50 in the evening and minus 55 overnight. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023
